archimate:Requirement.name: Vulnerability Remediation strategy and processes enabled accross organization
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Workflow bound to existing ITIL processes for existing assets Discovery, Patching etc.
CIS Control 7.2 Establish and maintain a risk-based remediation strategy documented in a remediation process, with monthly, or more frequent, reviews. CIS Control 7.3 Perform operating system updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis. CIS Control 7.4 Perform application updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis CIS Control 7.7 Remediate detected vulnerabilities in software through processes and tooling on a monthly, or more frequent, basis, based on the remediation process
Gartner Vulnerability Management Cycle: Remediate
